1.18.2.1.1.2: Ported to 1.18.0 .  Some rules such as cactus growth, gravity, ice melting, from 1.16 are broken/disabled in 1.17, (pending future updates from this mod, or mixins, or possibly forge PRs)
1.18.2.2.0.0: Port to 1.18.2.  Mod built now to depend on a library mod (flib).  Fixed mixin dependent gamerules: disableBiomeFreezeIce; disableBlockGravity; disableDecayCoral; disableDecayLeaves; disableLightMeltIce; doCactusGrowthUnlimited; doMapsAlwaysUpdate; doSugarGrowthUnlimited
